entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Burk's Falls
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 01:17 AM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mainly Clear, -3.1°C
entry.summary:

Temperature: -3.1°C

Humidity: 95 %

entry.title: Thursday: Snow or rain. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Snow or ice pellets mixed with freezing rain beginning late this morning then changing to rain this afternoon. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Rainfall amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind becoming east 20 km/h this morning. High plus 4. Wind chill minus 8 this morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Rain or snow. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Rain changing to a few flurries overnight. Rainfall amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind southeast 30 km/h becoming northwest 30 late this evening. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: A few flurries. Temperature falling to minus 6 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Flurries. Wind northwest 30 km/h becoming light early in the morning. Temperature falling to minus 6 in the afternoon. Wind chill near minus 10. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 09 February 2023
